sentences.en: A new rapid method for purifying serum α _ 1 - acid glycoprotein ( α _ 1 AGP ) is presented.
sentences.cn: 本文报道一种快速提纯血清α_1酸性糖蛋白抗原 ( α_1AGP ) 的新方法.

sentences.en: Employing computer analysis, gp 37 was show as a late gene encoding a 37 kDa glycoprotein.
sentences.cn: 分子生物学软件分析表明,gp37为病毒晚期表达的糖蛋白基因.

sentences.en: Fetuin - A , an acute phase glycoprotein, is one of the more powerful circulating inhibitors of hydroxyapatite formation.
sentences.cn: 急性期糖蛋白胎球蛋白-A是一种羟磷灰石形成过程中的有效循环抑制剂.

sentences.en: Glycoprotein A conjugated protein formed by the combination of a protein with carbohydrate side chains.
sentences.cn: 糖蛋白:是将蛋白与糖基侧链结合形成的一种结合蛋白.

sentences.en: Human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) is a glycoprotein hormone.
sentences.cn: 人绒毛膜促 性腺 激素是一种糖蛋白激素.

sentences.en: Measurement of intracellular daunomycin ( DNR ) and membrane glycoprotein ( P - gp ), by flow cytometry.
sentences.cn: 用流式细胞技术检测肝癌细胞MDRI基因产物—P—精蛋白 ( P -gp ) 的表达以及细胞内柔红霉素 ( DNR ) 浓度.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the change of serum α1 acid glycoprotein ( AAG ) in patients with malignant tumor.
sentences.cn: 目的　探讨α1-酸性蛋白 ( AAG ) 在恶性肿瘤中的改变.

sentences.en: P - glycoprotein is one of the members in the superfamily of ATP - binding cassette transporters.
sentences.cn: 糖蛋白是ATP结合盒转运超家族成员之一,在体内许多部位均有表达,与多药耐药性有关.

sentences.en: P - gp is a multiple transmembrane - spanning glycoprotein.
sentences.cn: P -gp 是多重跨膜糖蛋白.

sentences.en: Prostate - specific antigen ( PSA ) is a well characterized human prostate specific glycoprotein.
sentences.cn: 摘要前列腺特定抗原 ( PSA ) 为一已经定性清楚之人类前到腺特定醣蛋白.

sentences.en: Purpose : To study antigenic epitopes and expression of P glycoprotein.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究P糖蛋白抗原表位和表达.

sentences.en: Straight edge: The miracle fruit (Synsepalum dulcificum), native to West Africa, contains a glycoprotein called miraculin that binds to taste receptors on the tongue and makes sour foods taste sweet.
sentences.cn: 神秘果：一种原产于西非的水果，内含一种叫神秘果蛋白的糖蛋白。 神秘果蛋白结合在味蕾上以后，吃酸的东西也感到是甜的。

sentences.en: The immunoglobulins ( Igs ) , most of them are glycoprotein, play an important role on humoral immune.
sentences.cn: 免疫球蛋白在人体体液免疫中发挥巨大作用,而其均为糖蛋白.

sentences.en: The structure and function of carbohydrate in glycoprotein attracts much attention nowadays.
sentences.cn: 糖蛋白分子中糖链的结构与功能愈来愈受到关注.

sentences.en: Transferrin, widely known as an iron - binding glycoprotein, is a multi - tasking protein.
sentences.cn: 转铁蛋白是一种铁结合性糖蛋白, 具有多种生物学功能.

sentences.en: Vitamins function as photoreceptor mechanism of retina, maintenance of integrity of epithelia, lysosome stability, glycoprotein synthesis.
sentences.cn: 它的作用有:视网膜光受体机制 、 护上皮细胞的完整性 、 酶体的稳定性 、 蛋白的合成等.

sentences.en: What makes the fruit strange and miraculous, is miraculin (a sugar substitute), which is found in large quantities in the fruit, combined with a glycoprotein.
sentences.cn: 神秘果之所以奇妙神奇，是因水果中含有大量的神秘果素（代糖），合成一种糖蛋白（变味糖蛋白）。

trans.tran_en: any of a group of conjugated proteins containing small amounts of carbohydrates as prosthetic groups
